code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import apiUrl from"../config";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GraphViewer=_ref=>{let{filename}=_ref;const[graphSrc,setGraphSrc]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const graphUrl=`${apiUrl}/get-graph/${filename}`;setGraphSrc(graphUrl);},[filename]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Graph for ",filename]}),graphSrc&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:graphSrc,alt:`Graph for ${filename}`})]});};export default GraphViewer;
